objarg.name: min
objarg.description:
set the minmum value
default is 0
see setMin

attribute.name: wrap
attribute.description: if set to true max value will jump to min value and vice versa

method.name: int
method.description:
In left input: decrement the current value, will repeat at intervall
In middle input: increment the current value, will repeat at intervall
In right input: force the current value

method.name: bang
method.description:
in left input: decrement the value
in middle input: increment the value

method.name: forceValue
method.description: In right input: set the current value

method.name: intervall
method.description:
In right input: set the repeat intervall.
if the left or middle port receive an integer value the value will be repeatedly decremented or incremented at the given intervall

method.name: setMax
method.description:
set the minmum possible value.
there is no check if the min value is actually smaller then the max value

method.name: setMin
method.description:
set the maximum possible value
there is no check if the min value is actually smaller then the max value

method.name: wrap
method.description: if set to true max value will jump to min value and vice versa
